TransformStreamDefaultControllerDesiredS.summary: The desiredSize read-only property of the interface returns the desired size to fill the queue of the associated .

remarks.para: The internal queue of a ReadableStream contains chunks that have been enqueued, but not yet read. The browser determines the desired size to fill the stream, and it is this value returned by the desiredSize property.
If the desiredSize is 0 then the queue is full. Therefore you can use this information to manually apply backpressure to manage the queue.
